headline: How Investors May Respond To International Paper (IP) Expanding Containerboard Production and Renewing Kraton Partnership
summary: Kraton Corporation recently announced the renewal of agreements with International Paper to ensure uninterrupted site services at Kraton’s Savannah, Georgia facility, while International Paper also revealed plans to convert its No. 16 paper machine at the Riverdale mill in Alabama to containerboard production by the third quarter of 2026. This collaboration highlights both companies’ focus on operational reliability, supply chain continuity, and long-term investments in sustainable packaging...

headline: International Paper restructures to streamline operations
summary: The company is restructuring its North American packaging business to improve its service and manufacturing footprint.
